text: Ara yakhana tadera kache amadera suspasta nirdesabali abrtti kara haya takhana tara bale -- ''e to ekajana manusa chara ara ke'u naya ye tomadera phiriye rakhate caya ta theke yara upasana karata tomadera pitrpurusara.’’ Ara tara bale -- ''e ekati banano mithya byatita ara kichu naya.’’ Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara satya-sanbandhe, eti yakhana tadera kache ase takhana, bale -- ''e spasta jadu bai to naya.’’
